name: Mahjong Kaigan Monogatari: Mahjong Kyou Jidai Sexy Idol Hen
overview: Mahjong Kaigan Monogatari: Mahjong Kyou Jidai Sexy Idol Hen (麻雀海岸物語 麻雀狂時代 セクシーアイドル編) is a mahjong game developed and published by Micronet for the Sega Saturn. The game features live-action footage, and also comes with a poster.
